location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch map showing Motor Road from Kuwait to Riyadh'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: 3 paper folios.Condition: the folios have tears and creases.Foliation: this item has a foliation number in the top right hand corner of each folio; the number is enclosed by a circle.

mods.abstract: 'Sketch map showing Motor Road from Kuwait to Riyadh', on three sheets, prepared by Lieutenant Colonel Harold Richard Patrick Dickson, CIE Chief Local Representative of Kuwait Oil Company, Kuwait.
